title: Quantum OPML flux
html: I wonder how annoying it would be to pipe my OPML blog's RSS feed straight into individual asides entries here on this blog, maybe once an hour or three to account for quantum editing flux?
body: I wonder how annoying it would be to pipe my OPML blog's RSS feed straight into individual asides entries here on this blog, maybe once an hour or three to account for quantum editing flux?
